message.content:
I need to calculate the final depreciation item in the income statement based on the provided transactions data.

Looking at the data, I need to find all depreciation-related transactions.

In this type of task, I need to locate entries with the "Depreciation" type and sum their amounts.

Scanning through the transactions data, I can see one entry with the type "Depreciation":

| id | type | date | recorded_date | amount | recorded_amount |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Depreciation20240101001 | Depreciation | 2024-01-01 | 2024-01-01 | 45749.3 | 45749.3 |

This is the only depreciation entry in the transactions table. The amount is 45749.3.

Since there's only one depreciation transaction in the period, the final depreciation item in the income statement would be 45749.3.

```json
{"solution": {'Depreciation': '45749.3'} }
```
